rules_text:
[i](As a Siege enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it’s defeated, exile it, then cast it transformed.)[/i]
When this battle enters, creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain trample until end of turn.
rules_text2:
The Fog King has protection from nonlegendary spells and permanents. [i](This permanent can’t be targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything nonlegendary spells and permanent.)[/i]
Nonlegendary creatures have protection from The Fog King.
At the beginning of each upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on The Fog King.
